body.name: Lansinoh Glass Baby Bottles for Breastfeeding Babies, 8 Ounces, 4 Count, Includes 4 Medium Flow Nipples (Size 3M)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 9 hrs 58 mins
features: FROM BREAST TO BOTTLE AND BACK- NaturalWave Nipples are clinically proven to reduce nipple confusion, encouraging your baby to use the same feeding actions learned while breastfeeding
PREMIUM DURABLE GLASS- Made from premium borosilicate glass, these sturdy baby bottles are heat and thermal shock resistant, plus BPA and BPS free
AIR VENTILATION SYSTEM- Our NaturalWave nipples are designed to reduce intake of air and potential causes of gas associated with colic to help baby while bottle feeding
EASY TO CLEAN AND USE- These dishwasher safe baby bottles only have four pieces and can easily be cleaned and reassembled as often as needed.

PACED FEEDING FRIENDLY- These glass bottles encourage your baby to use the same natural feeding actions learned while breastfeeding, allowing a consistent flow rate of breastmilk and maintaining established breastfeeding patterns.

MEDIUM-FLOW NIPPLES INCLUDED- 8oz baby bottles come with medium flow (2 included) silicone nipples that allow baby to control milk flow. We also offer slow flow and fast flow silicone nipples sold separately for pace feeding convenience
body.description: A better bottle for a breastfed baby. Make it easier for your little one with a baby bottle designed to smooth the transition from breast to bottle and back. Lansinoh's NaturalWave Nipple supports your baby by promoting the same natural feeding actions they learned while breastfeeding and is clinically proven to reduce nipple confusion. The bottle is made from premium borosilicate glass that is heat and thermal shock resistant. The bottle nipples are soft and flexible, with an air ventilation system to reduce air intake, a potential cause of colic or spit up. These baby essentials are dishwasher safe with only four pieces for easy cleaning and assembly. BPA and BPS free. For nearly 40 years, new mothers have trusted Lansinoh to support and care for them while they enter the messy magic of motherhood. Born from one mother’s realization that birthing people often go without the support they need and deserve, Lansinoh proudly stands with mothers all over the world. Our journey started with award winning, doctor recommended HPA Lanolin Nipple Cream: today, we offer a comprehensive collection of solutions to help new parents navigate pregnancy, birth, breastfeeding, and pumping. Our product range includes organic nipple balm, disposable nursing pads, washable nursing pads, breastmilk storage bags, manual breast pumps and double electric breast pumps, postpartum essentials, baby bottles, and more. Lansinoh products are available in more than 70 countries and the company is committed to being climate neutral by 2030.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally A Bottle My Son Will Take!
reviews.reviewText: We've used every brand possible and we've finally came across these!My son instantly latched onto them and feeding has been a breeze since. The bottles being glass gives my wife and I peace of mind.The bottles also clean extremely well in a dishwasher. We bought 12 bottles total and we can rotate through 2 sets of 6 bottles and it makes life soo much easier.They're also very durable. We've dropped them on accident both full and empty and they don't have any chips, cracks or scratchesIf you have a fussy baby and the other brands of bottles don't work. I'd recommend these as the wide nipple seems to do the trick in mimicking a breast very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the glass
reviews.reviewText: These are amazing. I love the glass and slim look. It’s easy to clean and put together. No leaks. I highly recommend glass so I say this is a great bottle to use. The nipple shape is also nice, I think it makes it easier for the baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these bottles! I upgraded to this larger 8oz size since my kiddo is 12 months old now, and wants more volume in one sitting! I didn't realize they were glass (definitely my fault haha), but they're super strong! My son loves to throw his bottles and we haven't had any breaks of any kind! These are also the best bottle nipples on the market. They mimic a breast better than other designs, thus making the transition from breast to bottle super seemless. Nice work, team!! I recommend these to every new mom I know, and will continue to do so :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are THE BEST
reviews.reviewText: Any new parents out there wondering what kind of bottles to get, get these. They are less of a hassle to clean than the Dr Browns bottles.Whether for breast milk or formula these are by far the best ones we've tried..Get them in glass but I also have the plastic ones which I like as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The worst baby bottles, except for all of the others
reviews.reviewText: I don’t just dislike these bottles. I am angry about it.Part of my anger is the fact that there aren’t better options. These guys have the only nipple-shaped nipples I have found. (And I looked *hard!*) They’re still not ideal from all of the breastfeeding books I have read (again, I looked hard!!!) but the best I could find. And I’m not going to heat anything for my baby in plastic, so this is it.Here’s the problem. Not only do they break (of course they break, they’re glass). They break into more pieces than I have ever seen glass break into. I knocked a bottle off the countertop last week, spent literal hours on my hands and knees trying to get everything up, and I still find shards multiple times a day.Why is this a problem? Because mamas are tired so we break things. And babies are unpredictable so they break things. And you know what else babies do? Crawl on the floor, learn to walk on the floor, and eat anything they can find. So I literally get to watch my baby pick tiny pieces of glass out of our rug all day and run to her before she can get it into her mouth.Do better Lansinoh. I paid $10 each for these things, and a jar of pickles has higher quality glass. They should be tempered glass. They should have integrated silicone pieces to hold the glass together if it breaks. You should have silicone sleeves. I’ve used glass water bottles for years since learning about BPA’s. I’ve broken a few and yet they still hold together just fine.We’re talking about babies here. BABIES. Eating shards of glass. I get that you wanted them to be lightweight so you made them oh so very thin, but just freaking make them smaller instead!Tempered glass people. Silicone sleeves. Plastic around the outside to keep it together. If you don’t do it I am going to freaking start my own bottle company because this is terrible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bottles for Breastfed Babies!
reviews.reviewText: Lansinoh is a trusted brand in my household. I breastfed both of my children for 6 months each and their products are definitely perfect for breastfeeding mothers. These glass bottles are absolutely perfect for babies transitioning from the breast to the bottle. The nipple is wide with a narrow end just like the nipple of a breast. You can tell that they are anti-colic and prevent airflow into the babies tummy because air bubbles flow back into the bottle away from the nipple while the baby drinks the milk. It was easy for my son to latch onto the nipple of these bottles. I have not experienced any leaking with these bottles, so that is definitely a plus! The glass is so easy to clean and it is easy to warm milk in these bottles under warm running water in the sink. I love that these bottles are labeled with whole and half ounce increments. The only reason why I gave these bottles 4 stars is due to them only coming with medium flow nipples. My son is a preemie, so I had to purchase the Lansinoh slow flow nipples separately from the bottles. For the price point that these are sold at, this set should definitely include 2 extra slow flow nipples to meet the needs of different babies. Otherwise, with the slow flow nipples these bottles are now my favorite bottle for my baby!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Depends on what you need it for
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are high quality which is why I gave the 4/5 stars. It is not the best bottle in my opinion to use for pumping and feeding baby though.If you want a glass bottle and are willing to deal with the issues or just use the for storage then you’ll like them.Upsides: Good quality, milk fat does not stick to the sides as much in the fridge (compared to plastic), bigger size = holds more milk, no fogging over time.Downsides: Bottle *and* milk get too hot in the bottle warmer (even if you pour the milk in a different bottle, it’s too hot for baby), heavy to wear on breast pump and for dropping on toes.I’m not brave enough to give this bottle to a toddler because it is glass. Toddlers drop/throw and glass breaks. I also consider that a downside.Over all it is a well made product. You just need to decide if glass is right for you. I would search harder to find plastic bottles in the bigger size of Lansinoh if I had it to do over again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Weight of bottles not too heavy.

reviews.reviewText: Diese Flaschen wurden uns von unserer Hebamme empfohlen als unsere Mäuse andere Marken abgelehnt hatten. Die Flaschen sind wirklich sehr sehr robust uns ist ausversehen eine Flasche runtergefallen die Flasche war ganz und der Teller kaputt. 😅Sie sind bei uns mehrmals täglich im Gebrauch, ich würde sie immer wieder nachkaufen
Me lo recomendaron en la unidad de lactancia y muy contenta

Super verarbeitet! Unsere Kleine hat viele Flaschen abgelehnt, mit Lansinoh haben wir dann den entscheidenden Tipp bekommen. Seitdem nur noch Lansinoh, erst Plastik (leichter zu halten, da weniger Gewicht) und jetzt die größeren aus Glas und nie Probleme gehabt ☺️
Unsere Maus nimmt nur die Flaschen! Bei Problemen hatten wir einen super Kundendienst.

Insgesamt sind die Flaschen sehr gut - robust im Hinblick auf Temperaturunterschiede und tollpatschiges Umwerfen. Nicht so schön ist, dass die Glasflaschen im Vergleich zu den Kunststoffflaschen schlanker und dafür aber viel höher sind. Damit liegen sie ggf. nicht so gut in der Hand - vor allem passen sie leider nicht in jeden Sterilisator.
